projects.name: Trident Hills
projects.location: Sector 4, Pinjore-Kalka Urban Complex, Panchkula, Haryana 134102
projects.description: Trident Hills is a 200-acre premium integrated township nestled at the foothills of the Shivalik Hills, offering residential plots, premium floors, villas, and commercial spaces with world-class lifestyle amenities.
projects.overview: Welcome to Trident Hills — a 200-acre township designed for privileged living surrounded by the natural beauty of the Shivaliks. Strategically located on the Zirakpur-Kalka Highway (NH-5) in Pinjore, Panchkula, this gated community offers lush green surroundings, a state-of-the-art clubhouse 'The Azaleas', landscaped open areas, and a congestion-free environment. Developed by Godrej Properties, this township is future-ready, backed by world-class infrastructure and promising high investment potential.
locationHighlights: Close to Hospitals: Paras (8 km), Alchemist (10 km), PGI (24 km)
Elante Mall - 18 km, DT Mall - 25 km
Panchkula Golf Club (12 km), Chandigarh Golf Club (18 km)
Morni Hills (26 km), Sukhna Lake (20 km), Wildlife Reserves nearby

faqs.question: What is Trident Hills?
faqs.answer: Trident Hills is a 200-acre integrated residential township located in Pinjore, Panchkula at the foothills of the Shivalik range.

faqs.question: What does Trident Hills offer?
faqs.answer: It offers residential plots, low-rise premium floors, villas, group housing, and commercial spaces.

faqs.question: Where is Trident Hills located?
faqs.answer: It is situated in Sector 4, Pinjore-Kalka Urban Complex, Panchkula, Haryana 134102.

faqs.question: What are the project amenities?
faqs.answer: Amenities include green landscapes, clubhouse, herb gardens, car charging points, smart street lights, command center, CCTV, medical and educational facilities, power backup, and amphitheatre.

faqs.question: What makes Trident Hills unique?
faqs.answer: Its scenic location at the foothills of the Shivaliks, 200-acre scale, future-ready infrastructure, and lush green surroundings make it stand out.

faqs.question: What is available inside the clubhouse?
faqs.answer: The Azaleas clubhouse includes banquet, bars, cafes, gaming zones, indoor sports, gym, spa, yoga studio, kids activity zones, and even a private screening theatre.

faqs.question: What are the locational advantages?
faqs.answer: Excellent connectivity to Chandigarh, Mohali, Shimla; proximity to hospitals, schools, malls, and IT hubs; located on NH-5.

faqs.question: What is the starting price?
faqs.answer: Residential plots start from ₹1.08 Cr onwards. Floors start from ₹2.52 Cr.

faqs.question: Are there flexible payment plans?
faqs.answer: Yes. Time & Development Linked Plans and Down Payment Plans are available.

faqs.question: What is the possession date?
faqs.answer: Possession has already started, depending on phase and unit type.

faqs.question: Is it RERA registered?
faqs.answer: Yes. HRERA-PKL-PKL-355-2022 and HRERA-PKL-PKL-356-2022 (both dated 30.09.2022).

faqs.question: Which banks are offering home loans?
faqs.answer: Banks like HDFC, SBI, LIC Housing Finance, and Bajaj Finance are supporting the project.

reviews.name: Sandeep Verma
reviews.comment: Amazing location and concept. The idea of a full township with all facilities is very promising. Booked a plot.

reviews.name: Neha Gupta
reviews.comment: The sample floors look great. The construction quality seems top-notch. Eagerly waiting for possession.

contactInfo.address: Site Office, Trident Hills, Sector 4, Pinjore-Kalka Urban Complex, Panchkula, Haryana 134102

projects.name: Trident Panipat
projects.description: Trident Panipat is an upcoming integrated residential project offering plotted development in Sector 19A, Panipat. Strategically located near NH-44 and key infrastructure, it promises a lifestyle enriched with green living and premium amenities.
projects.overview: Developed by Godrej Properties, Trident Panipat spans around 150 acres of residential plots. The project emphasizes sustainable infrastructure, green landscaping, and seamless connectivity. It is currently in pre-launch and is attracting investors due to its high potential location and planned facilities.
locationHighlights: Close to educational institutes, hospitals & shopping malls
Easy access to industrial & business hubs

faqs.question: What is Trident Panipat?
faqs.answer: It is a pre-launch integrated residential project by Godrej Properties in Sector 19A, Panipat, offering plots and apartments.

faqs.question: What types of properties are available?
faqs.answer: Residential plots ranging from 270 to 1000 sq. yds.

faqs.question: Is the project RERA approved?
faqs.answer: Not yet but soon it will be rera approved.

faqs.question: What amenities are planned?
faqs.answer: Clubhouse, swimming pool, gym, sports courts, landscaped parks, children's play areas, yoga zones, security, and more.

faqs.question: What is the possession timeline?
faqs.answer: Currently not available. Project is in pre-launch stage.

faqs.question: What is the contact number for inquiries?
faqs.answer: You can call +91 9138331357 or WhatsApp at +91 9138331357.

projects.name: Trident Kundli
projects.description: An upcoming project offering residential plots and 2–4 BHK apartments in Kundli, Sonipat, with modern amenities and strategic NCR-location.
projects.overview: Trident Kundli is a pre‑launch township featuring custom plots and 2–4 BHK apartments, located near NH‑44 and the KMP Expressway. Designed to promote luxury, green living, and community-focused lifestyle with modern conveniences :contentReference[oaicite:3]{index=3}.
locationHighlights: Located in Kundli, Sonipat – Delhi‑NCR outskirts
Close to schools, hospitals, shopping hubs

faqs.question: What is Trident Kundli?
faqs.answer: An upcoming residential project by Godrej Properties offering plots and 2–4 BHK apartments in Kundli, Sonipat.

faqs.question: What types of units are available?
faqs.answer: Custom residential plots and 2, 3 & 4 BHK apartments.

faqs.question: What amenities are planned?
faqs.answer: Clubhouse, pool, gym, sports, spa, mini-theatre, parks, security, sustainability systems, and more.

faqs.question: Where is it located?
faqs.answer: Kundli in Sonipat district, near NH‑44 and KMP Expressway.

faqs.question: When is possession?
faqs.answer: NA – project is in pre‑launch stage.
